thread.title: Watch a Clip From St. Vincent’s Film The Birthday Party
thread.title_full: Watch a Clip From St. Vincent’s Film The Birthday Party

author: Noah Yoo
title: Watch a Clip From St. Vincent’s Film The Birthday Party
text:
Open share drawer Watch a Clip From St. Vincent’s Film The Birthday Party A mother stares down a panda in Annie Clark’s scene from the horror anthology XX St. Vincent Photo by Stefanie Keenan/Getty Images for ELLE 
St. Vincent ’s directorial debut, The Birthday Party , is in theaters and on-demand today. The short film, which is part of the horror anthology XX , depicts an 8-year-old’s birthday party gone awry. Today, in conjunction with the release, St. Vincent has shared a clip from the film. In it, kids are dressed up in costumes (there’s a toilet and a dolphin, among others) while a mother has a stare-down with a panda. Watch it below.
